ThermaRay's Radiant Heating Systems have been the smart choice for Architects, Engineers, Developers, Contractors, Renovators, Energy Management Consultants and Homeowners since 1985.Our radiant heating systems provide effective solutions to deliver comfort for a wide variety of construction projects, including:Commercial Radiant Heating Systems for: Hot Yoga Studios, Manufacturing Facilities, Office Building, Restaurants, Hotels and WarehousesIndustrial Radiant Heating Systems for Educational Buildings, Hospitals, Religious Buildings and StadiumsResidential Radiant Heating Systems for: Assisted Living Facilities, Condominiums, New Homes and RenovationsOur wide range of radiant heating system products provide elegant design solutions that save energy, are easy to install and lower the total cost of ownership compared to any other heating system.

Tom Orr has educated the nation about Long-Term Care and LTC Insurance since 1987. We offer compelling continuing education courses via live Webinar, enabling agents and financial planners to not only get educated and earn their CE credits, but also to become enlightened and empowered so they can sell more LTC Insurance, including traditional, Partnership and Hybrid/Linked Benefit plans.

I work with business owners who need the deep experience and education I offer as a marketing strategist, business developer and outsourced Chief Marketing Officer.If you are looking for more sales, I encourage you to contact me for a conversation about profitably accelerating the growth of your business.

Responsible for agent recruiting, training, sales and marketing support, motivation, management and sales results for the nation's leading long-term care planning agency. We're looking for military veterans ready to transition to a career as financial services sales professionals as well as established agents ready to make a difference in their clients lives.

Synergy is vaulting over "old school" sales and marketing paradigms and making transformational changes to a system that has not seen meaningful business practice and infrastructure change in decades. Our methodology is driven by a technology-enabled, yet human understanding of the needs of each Client Company and sales person, a commitment to true business transparency and by commanding modern innovations such as inbound marketing, expert social media and continuous, ongoing sales training, motivation and management. Deliver outsourced sales and marketing management solutions for businesses.  Recruit, train, manage and motivate Client Company sales teams. Position Client Company sales force to produce results. Ensure marketing investments lead to sales results.  Restructure Sales and Marketing Strategies for Client Companies. Develop Client Company Brand and Web Presence. Present Segmentation and Training to Client Company Sales Teams. Develop Client Company Marketing Plan and Budgets, Public Relations Programs and Promotion Strategies.   Motivate Sales Performance. Manage Sales Accountability. Build Local, National or International Sales Teams.

I recommend Bill and his team for three key reasons, beginning with integrity.  Bill insists on integrity with everyone on his team, and he only works with business owners who share the same values and commitments.  Secondly, Bill will help you uncover your true value differentiators and articulate your corporate uniqueness in a voice distinct from your competition.  Thirdly, Bill has exceedingly clear business vision.  Like a coach's outside set of eyes, he'll help you see your path to success in the clearest terms.  In my view, it would be a wise investment of your time to schedule some initial meetings Bill and his team.  See if what they can do is a good fit for you.

summary: As your Outsourced Chief Marketing Officer (CMO), other than the President and CEO, no position is more responsible for the growth and profitability of your business than the CMO. What are a CMO's responsibilities? Market Segmentation, Differentiation and Positioning, Product Development, Pricing Strategy, Distribution Strategy, Promotion Strategy and Sales Management.As your outsourced CMO, I work closely with the CEO and CFO, to grow the top line and the bottom line in your business. Creating opportunities (lead generation) is essential, but nothing happens until somebody sells something profitably.Let’s Explore Profitably Growing Your Business Together!
name: Bill Merrow
title: Marketing Strategy | Business Development | Outsourced Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)
